variables.name: color/neutral/black
variables.description: Near black with slight blue tint

variables.name: animation/duration/normal
variables.description: Standard transitions, hover effects, focus changes

variables.name: animation/easing/ease-in
variables.description: Accelerating, use for elements exiting the screen

variables.name: animation/easing/ease-out
variables.description: Decelerating, use for elements entering the screen

variables.name: animation/easing/ease-in-out
variables.description: Smooth acceleration and deceleration, use for most transitions

variables.name: animation/easing/spring
variables.description: Slight overshoot, use for playful or bouncy interactions

variables.name: shadow/xs
variables.description: Subtle shadow for cards and surfaces

variables.name: shadow/sm
variables.description: Small shadow for buttons and inputs

variables.name: shadow/md
variables.description: Medium shadow for dropdowns and popovers

variables.name: shadow/lg
variables.description: Large shadow for modals and dialogs

variables.name: shadow/xl
variables.description: Extra large shadow for sheets and elevated surfaces

variables.name: z-index/tooltip
variables.description: Tooltips, always on top of other overlays

variables.name: space/component/padding/xs
variables.description: Extra small component padding - density aware

variables.name: space/component/padding/xl
variables.description: Extra large component padding - density aware

variables.name: component/button/gap
variables.description: Gap between button icon and text
